long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select a piece of text and automatically generate flashcards! 

Questioner uses AI to generate questions and answer to the text you select. Then, we store it in a cloud database, from which you can download you flashcards whenever you want in a simple CSV format, which can be imported to all popular flashcard softwares. 

Accelerate your learning with AI-based software!
